name: cargoez-be
description: Node.js microservices with PostgreSQL and Clean Architecture

scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build -w @cargoez-be/user-service -w @cargoez-be/auth-service
scripts.build:packages: npm run build -w @rajkumarganesan93/domain && npm run build -w @rajkumarganesan93/shared && npm run build -w @rajkumarganesan93/api && npm run build -w @rajkumarganesan93/application && npm run build -w @rajkumarganesan93/infrastructure && npm run build -w @rajkumarganesan93/integrations
scripts.migrate:user: npm run build -w @cargoez-be/user-service && npm run migrate -w @cargoez-be/user-service
scripts.migrate:auth: npm run build -w @cargoez-be/auth-service && npm run migrate -w @cargoez-be/auth-service
scripts.migrate:all: npm run migrate:user && npm run migrate:auth
scripts.publish:packages: npm run build:packages && npm publish -w @rajkumarganesan93/domain && npm publish -w @rajkumarganesan93/shared && npm publish -w @rajkumarganesan93/api && npm publish -w @rajkumarganesan93/application && npm publish -w @rajkumarganesan93/infrastructure && npm publish -w @rajkumarganesan93/integrations
